Title: wUniApp
Description: Sample multiplatform project with bussines logic and MVVM in PCL for Windows WPF ,  Windows Phone 8 .1 & Windows Store 8.1 application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Sample multiplatform project with bussines logic and MVVM in PCL for Windows WPF , Windows Phone 8 .1 & Windows Store 8.1 application.

Based on Windows Universal Apps
(http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/dn609832.aspx)
and Portable class library
(http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg597391(v=vs.110).aspx)

This project is demo of my C# .NET source code focused now to WPF application.

Recommended:
Visual Studio 2013 with Update 2
